Comments: home port North Bend OR ; Dare Point near Carmanah is named after the ship

Comments: Built 1803 in Salem , Massachusetts . William Sturgis on board during 2nd voyage

Tons: 120 foot length , 306 tons , 16 officers and 86 men

Comments: Made four voyages to the Northwest Coast
HBC ship used for the PNW coast trade

Owner ( s ): Canadian Pacific Ry . ( 1898-1899 ) ; Edward J. Rathbone ( 1899-1900 ) ; U.S. Army ( 1900-1922 ) ; Alaskan Engineering Commission ( 1922-1923 ) ; The Alaska Railroad ( 1923-1933 )
Comments: Built in 1898 by C.P . Ry . at Vancouver , Washington
